After that, it all depends on skill.\""},{"lineNumber":21395,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐ…………ぅ、っ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... uh...!\""},{"lineNumber":21396,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貴様、はっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You... ha...!"},{"lineNumber":21397,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔人四天王シルキィ・リトルレーズン。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Demon General Silky Little Raisin."},{"lineNumber":21398,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その首、頂いていく」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll take your head.\""},{"lineNumber":21399,"originalJapaneseLine":"「勇者、かっ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A hero, huh...!"},{"lineNumber":21400,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔軍に……ケイブリスに与しているのかっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You're siding with the Demon Army... with Cavebliss...!"},{"lineNumber":21401,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人類のため――――だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For the sake of humanity―――."},{"lineNumber":21402,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔王を守り、人を長く苦しめる……","translatedEnglishLine":"Protecting the Demon King, causing humans long suffering..."},{"lineNumber":21403,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前は、ここで死ね」","translatedEnglishLine":"You shall die here.\""},{"lineNumber":21404,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐっ……！　そう、簡単にはっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...! aaaaah!\""},{"lineNumber":21412,"originalJapaneseLine":"力任せに、勇者の身体を突き飛ばす。","translatedEnglishLine":"He pushed the hero's body forcefully One――――\""},{"lineNumber":21417,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだとっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What...!?\""},{"lineNumber":21418,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィの、意識の外。","translatedEnglishLine":"Outside uh, ah...\""},{"lineNumber":21423,"originalJapaneseLine":"必殺の斬撃をまともに受け、","translatedEnglishLine":"Taking a deadly slash fatal wound already."},{"lineNumber":21428,"originalJapaneseLine":"指ひとつ動かせない状態で、","translatedEnglishLine":"Unable to move a single finger,"},{"lineNumber":21429,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィは勇者を見上げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky looked up at the hero."},{"lineNumber":21430,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――――他の、人には…………","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—Don't... hurt anyone them.\""},{"lineNumber":21432,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........................\""},{"lineNumber":21433,"originalJapaneseLine":"それが、シルキィの最期の言葉だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Those were Silky's last words."},{"lineNumber":21434,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":21435,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":21436,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、魔血魂は回収、と。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, the demon blood soul has been collected."},{"lineNumber":21437,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いやー、一般人がいたおかげで楽でしたね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, having civilians around made it easier, huh.\""},{"lineNumber":21438,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………そうだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................Indeed."},{"lineNumber":21439,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ただの1対1なら、こうはいかなかった」","translatedEnglishLine":"If it had been just one-on-one, it wouldn't have gone like this.\""},{"lineNumber":21440,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おや、殊勝な。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh my, how noble."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その眼前には、外骨格の胸部を貫かれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right before his eyes, the exoskeleton's chest was pierced,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 血にまみれたシルキィの姿があった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was Silky, soaked in blood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まぁ、剣はイケるでしょ。後は腕次第ですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, the sword should work. After that, it all depends on skill."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人四天王シルキィ・リトルレーズン。
魔軍に……ケイブリスに与しているのかっ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're siding with the Demon Army... with Cavebliss...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王を守り、人を長く苦しめる……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Protecting the Demon King, causing humans long suffering...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 断ち割られたリトルを瞬時に再構成し、
辛うじて武器の体裁を作り上げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he barely managed to form a weapon shape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嵐と見紛うばかりの一撃を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A strike that could be mistaken for a storm,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィの魔導具が受け止める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was caught by Silky's magical tool.
Even without a wound, this is...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 力任せに、勇者の身体を突き飛ばす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He pushed the hero's body forcefully away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ッ、ここでは、巻き添えが出る……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (If we stay here, bystanders will get caught...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 低い態勢で、アリオスは懐に飛び込んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arios slipped in close with a low stance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必殺の斬撃をまともに受け、
シルキィの身体が血溜まりに沈む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky's body sank into a pool of blood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指ひとつ動かせない状態で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unable to move a single finger,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィは勇者を見上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky looked up at the hero.
Don't lay a hand... on them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが、シルキィの最期の言葉だった。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, the demon blood soul has been collected.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いやー、一般人がいたおかげで楽でしたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, having civilians around made it easier, huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただの1対1なら、こうはいかなかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it had been just one-on-one, it wouldn't have gone like this."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
